summary: Diff implements a new mobile-first tabbed UI with Home/Live, Browse Shows (mock data + filters), Settings/About, expanded Now Playing screen (volume + sleep timer), persistent mini-player, reusable UI components (tab nav, show cards, live indicators), and updates dark theme tokens + PWA metadata. A few BuildRequest items are not evidenced (time filter, theme/stream quality controls, generated image assets), and at least one unrequested feature (Google Cast SDK script) was introduced.

missing_requirements.reason: BrowseShowsScreen implements genre and day filters, but no time filter is present in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Settings/About includes optional stream quality and theme mode controls (or clearly disabled/omitted).
missing_requirements.reason: SettingsAboutScreen shows Notifications, About, and Contact sections, but no theme mode toggle/control or stream quality control is evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static visual assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in UI.
missing_requirements.reason: Code references multiple generated asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code changes are listed).

hallucinated_features.description: Google Cast SDK added to the web app via an external script include.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for casting support, and adding a third-party SDK is an unrequested capability.
